title: Boltzmann distributions of 2 gases - greater MM

content.question: The Maxwell-Boltzmann distributions of molecular speeds in samples of two different gases at the same temperature are shown above. Which gas has the greater molar mass?

choices.label: Both gases have the same molar mass.
It cannot be determined unless the pressure of each sample is known.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
